projects.name: PLAATO: Reinventing the Airlock
projects.blurb: A tool for beer brewers that wants a unique insight in the fermentation process. 100% non-invasive.

projects.name: THE YOUNG FABLES are recording a CLASSIC COUNTRY record !
projects.blurb: THE YOUNG FABLES have the opportunity to record a "classic country" album with Grammy Award winning producer Mitch Dane.

projects.name: Cassandra House Full Length Album
projects.blurb: A full length album of original folk music that has been waiting patiently for a long time do be heard.

projects.name: A cowboy's work is never done: 15 years of heliumcowboy
projects.blurb: A book project in celebration of the Hamburg based art gallery heliumcowboy

projects.name: STAY BOLD: 100 DAYS 100 SONGS
projects.blurb: We need $14,000 to make 100 songs about taking action in the world of Trump. Your support will help 15 artists make this project.

projects.name: Dead Matter
projects.blurb: A rogue-lite that aims to quench the community's thirst for a title that properly balances survival mechanics with fulfilling gameplay.

projects.name: We're Still Here: An All-Trans Comics Anthology
projects.blurb: The first anthology of comics entirely by and for transgender creators.

projects.name: Panobook: A Notebook for Your Desk
projects.blurb: A panoramic notebook for your desk, and eventually, your shelf. Made of quality materials and thoughtful details.

projects.name: If You Look Up to the Sky
projects.blurb: A story that reminds girls of color that they are loved, protected and deserve a place and presence in the world.

projects.name: Deer Woman: An Anthology
projects.blurb: Based on stories of Indigenous women, Deer Woman: An Anthology is a powerful graphic expression of empowerment and resilience.

projects.name: Sonnet: World's Most Advanced Off-Grid Mobile Mesh Network
projects.blurb: Send text messages, voice recordings, images, and GPS locations on your phone without cellular coverage, satellite, or Internet access.

projects.name: Dennis and Lois
projects.blurb: A documentary about the legendary rock n' roll music super fans, Dennis and Lois.

projects.name: PALADIN: Warriors of Charlemagne
projects.blurb: Charge into the exciting medieval world as a paladin of the great Charlemagne! Based on the award-winning game King Arthur Pendragon!

projects.name: OTHER MUSIC: The Story Of An Iconic Independent Record Store
projects.blurb: A documentary chronicling the 20 year history & legacy of Other Music, its influence on music in New York City, & its closure in 2016.

projects.name: Star Realms Frontiers
projects.blurb: Frontiers is a 1-4 player standalone expansion for the multiple game-of-the-year award winning Star Realms Deckbuilding Game.
